description: RIA-2169 Send without hearing requirements notification (Admin Officer)

notifications.subject: Immigration and Asylum appeal: list case
body: The Tribunal Caseworker has recorded the length of the hearing. No hearing requirements or adjustments have been submitted.
Go to the Hearing tab to view the length of the hearing and then list the case in Aria.
You should then list the case in the online service. Once you've done this, the Notice of Hearing will be sent to all parties.
